title: Merlin's Apprentice
resume: Merlin's Apprentice is a British miniseries that aired on Channel 4 in 2006.  The series is a sequel to the 1998 miniseries Merlin starring Sam Neill and Miranda Richardson. In this sequel, Merlin awakes after a nap of fifty years.
